author: rusty-man
description: Gulag users by restricting them to a channel.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing `gulag`. See `[p]help Gulag` for details.
NOTE: Make a gulag channel and a gulag role before setting up the cog.

Visit [-this-](<https://github.com/rusty-man/rusty-cogs/tree/main/gulag>) for a dedicated guide.
